Package edu.bu.pas.pokemon.core

Class Team.TeamView

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.pas.pokemon.core.Team.TeamView
Enclosing class:
Team
public static class Team.TeamView extends Object
A read-only data structure that contains a deep-copy of all values present in a Team object **except** for the Agent. A TeamView does **not** have an Agent reference inside it. The purpose of this class is to provide a way for Agent's to perceive a Team without gaining access to a way to mess with the internals of a Team. I guess I could've just given a deep-copy of a Team to any Agent but this works too.
See Also:
  • Pokemon.PokemonView
  • Move.MoveView

  • Constructor Details

    • TeamView

      public TeamView(Team team)
      A constructor to convert a Team instance to a TeamView instance. Each Pokemon in the Team will be converted into a Pokemon.PokemonView, while the last Move performed by the Team will be converted into a Move.MoveView. The Agent inside of the Team will not be carried over to this TeamView instance.
      Parameters:
      team - The Team instance to construct this instance from.
